note:
Late of night & far from home, you encounter MUTINY CRINSHAW. It/they strike a queer & chimeric silhouette against the starlit sky.

Are you sure this is the place?

[Avatar: Dark Lili from Legend (1985), a witch in a high-neck dress dancing before a fire. Header: A tarot card draw in red & gold tones, showing Temperance & the 7 of Coins, a long claw lolling in the background]

fields.name: Habitat
fields.value: Wastelands, wilderlands, the rural midwest (Turtle Island)

fields.name: Treasure type
fields.value: forbidden books (10% chance magic items but 100% chance cursed)

fields.name: Attacks
fields.value: gaze attack, or as per spell employed
